verbose_text: The activation of VEGFR2 triggers the conformational activation of integrins followed by the stimulation of nuclear factor-kappaB (NF-kappaB), a transcription factor responsible not only for adaptation to flow but also for the de novo synthesis of adhesion molecules, including VCAM-1, E-selectin and ICAM-1.
evidence: VEGFR2 triggers the conformational activation of integrins
